dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 1023 PCS: Small Business Investment Company Capital Act of 2015
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Received; read twice and placed on the calendar

form.official-title: To amend the Small Business Investment Act of 1958 to provide for increased limitations on leverage for multiple licenses under common control.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Small Business Investment Company Capital Act of 2015.

section.header: Increased limitations on leverage for multiple licenses under common control
section.text: Section 303(b)(2)(B) of the Small Business Investment Act of 1958 (15 U.S.C. 683(b)(2)(B)) is amended by striking $225,000,000 and inserting $350,000,000.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives July 13, 2015.

endorsement.action-desc: Received; read twice and placed on the calendar
